projectInfo.name: Harmony Farm Sanctuary Website
projectInfo.description: Complete website revamp for Harmony Farm Sanctuary

master.description: Main development branch

master.title: Project Setup and Development Environment
master.description: Initialize the React/TypeScript project with proper tooling configuration
master.testStrategy: Verify project builds successfully and development server starts without errors
master.details: Set up the foundational React/TypeScript project structure using Vite, configure Tailwind CSS, and establish the proper development environment according to project guidelines.

master.title: Design System and Component Library Foundation
master.description: Establish the core design system, typography, colors, and base component library
master.testStrategy: Verify all design tokens are properly configured and base components render correctly
master.details: Create the sanctuary-specific color palette, typography scale, spacing system, and foundational UI components that will be used throughout the site.

master.title: Navigation and Routing System
master.description: Implement the site navigation structure with mobile-responsive menu
master.testStrategy: Test navigation on mobile and desktop, verify all routes work correctly
master.details: Build the main navigation component with mobile hamburger menu, set up React Router, and create the overall site structure.

master.title: Homepage Hero and Landing Sections
master.description: Create the compelling homepage with hero section and key calls-to-action
master.testStrategy: Verify homepage loads quickly, hero section is engaging, and CTAs are prominent
master.details: Design and implement the homepage hero section with sanctuary imagery, mission statement, and primary calls-to-action for donations, volunteering, and animal profiles.

master.title: About Us and Mission Pages
master.description: Build comprehensive About section including mission, team, and sanctuary story
master.testStrategy: Verify content is well-organized, images load properly, and text is readable
master.details: Create pages for the sanctuary's story, mission statement, team member profiles, and organizational information.

master.title: Animal Profiles System Foundation
master.description: Create the structure for individual animal profile pages
master.testStrategy: Test animal profile template with sample data, verify image galleries work
master.details: Build the template system for individual animal profiles including photo galleries, rescue stories, and sponsorship call-to-actions.

master.title: Meet the Animals Landing Page
master.description: Create the main animals page with category filtering and grid display
master.testStrategy: Test filtering functionality, verify grid layout is responsive
master.details: Build the animals overview page with category filters (cows, pigs, goats, etc.) and attractive grid layout linking to individual profiles.

master.title: Contact and Visit Information Page
master.description: Build contact page with location details, map integration, and contact forms
master.testStrategy: Verify map displays correctly, contact forms validate and submit properly
master.details: Create contact page with embedded Google Map, sanctuary address, hours, and contact form functionality.

master.title: Volunteer Information and Application System
master.description: Build volunteer pages with opportunity listings and application forms
master.testStrategy: Test volunteer application form submission and validation
master.details: Create volunteer opportunity descriptions, requirements, and online application form with proper data collection and submission handling.

master.title: Donation Page and Payment Integration
master.description: Implement secure donation functionality with multiple payment options
master.testStrategy: Test donation flow, verify payment processing works securely
master.details: Build donation page with one-time and recurring options, integrate with secure payment processor, and implement thank-you flow.

master.title: Blog and News System
master.description: Create content management system for blog posts and sanctuary news
master.testStrategy: Verify blog posts display correctly, test categorization and search
master.details: Build blog system with post creation, categorization, and display functionality for sharing rescue stories and sanctuary updates.

master.title: FAQ and Educational Resources
master.description: Build comprehensive FAQ section and educational content pages
master.testStrategy: Test FAQ search functionality, verify educational content is well-organized
master.details: Create FAQ section with search functionality and educational resources about animal welfare, veganism, and sanctuary practices.

master.title: Merchandise Store Foundation
master.description: Build e-commerce functionality for sanctuary merchandise
master.testStrategy: Test product catalog, shopping cart, and checkout process
master.details: Create merchandise store with product catalog, shopping cart functionality, and prepare for Printful integration.

master.title: Events Calendar System
master.description: Implement events calendar with registration and management features
master.testStrategy: Test event creation, calendar display, and RSVP functionality
master.details: Build events calendar system with event listing, detailed event pages, and RSVP/registration capabilities.

master.title: Newsletter and Social Media Integration
master.description: Integrate newsletter signup and social media feeds
master.testStrategy: Test newsletter signup, verify social media embeds work properly
master.details: Implement newsletter subscription functionality and integrate social media feeds to keep content fresh and encourage engagement.

master.title: Search Functionality
master.description: Implement site-wide search for animals, content, and resources
master.testStrategy: Test search across different content types, verify results are relevant
master.details: Build search functionality that can find animals, blog posts, FAQ items, and other site content.

master.title: Animal Sponsorship Program
master.description: Implement dedicated sponsorship features for individual animals
master.testStrategy: Test sponsorship signup, verify recurring payment setup
master.details: Create animal-specific sponsorship programs with recurring donations and sponsor recognition features.

master.title: Printful E-commerce Integration
master.description: Integrate Printful API for print-on-demand merchandise fulfillment
master.testStrategy: Test end-to-end order process with Printful integration
master.details: Integrate Printful API for automated merchandise fulfillment, including product sync and order management.

master.title: SEO Optimization and Schema Markup
master.description: Implement comprehensive SEO features and structured data
master.testStrategy: Verify SEO meta tags, test schema markup validation
master.details: Implement SEO best practices including meta tags, schema markup, sitemap generation, and local SEO optimization.

master.title: Performance Optimization
master.description: Optimize site performance including image loading and caching
master.testStrategy: Test Core Web Vitals, verify images load efficiently
master.details: Implement performance optimizations including image lazy loading, code splitting, and caching strategies.

master.title: Accessibility Compliance
master.description: Ensure WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance across the site
master.testStrategy: Run accessibility audits, test with screen readers
master.details: Implement accessibility features including proper ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, and screen reader compatibility.

master.title: Analytics and Tracking Setup
master.description: Implement Google Analytics and other tracking tools
master.testStrategy: Verify analytics tracking is working correctly
master.details: Set up Google Analytics 4, conversion tracking, and other analytics tools to monitor site performance and user behavior.

master.title: Content Management System
master.description: Build admin interface for content updates and management
master.testStrategy: Test content editing interface, verify permissions work correctly
master.details: Create admin interface for sanctuary staff to update animal profiles, blog posts, and other content without developer assistance.

master.title: Cross-Browser Testing and Bug Fixes
master.description: Comprehensive testing across browsers and devices
master.testStrategy: Test on multiple browsers, verify mobile responsiveness
master.details: Conduct thorough testing across different browsers, devices, and screen sizes, fixing any compatibility issues.

master.title: Deployment and Launch Preparation
master.description: Set up production deployment and launch the new website
master.testStrategy: Verify production deployment works correctly, test all functionality in production
master.details: Configure production deployment, set up CI/CD pipeline, and coordinate the launch of the new website.
